name: PulmonaryAndGastrointestionalHemorrhage
title: Pulmonary and Gastrointestional Hemorrhage
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of pulmonary and gastrointestinal hemorrhage.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of pulmonary and gastrointestinal hemorrhage or bleeding, which could also be in combination with ulcers and/or perforation.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that do not indicate hemorrhage or bleeding.)
